form.name: jaundice_two
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Jaundice> Jaundice TWO

field.name: Severe Jaundice
field.options: Any jaundice if newborn is < 48 hours old | OR > 14 days old | OR has yellow palms and soles at any age |Click here to take action

field.name: Jaundice
field.options: Jaundice if baby > 48 hours old and < 14 days old | AND palms and soles are not yellow | Click here to take action
